section.title: The Agreements Item Terms help screen
section.para: This screen is used to enter or maintain terms that are specific to an agreement item. The terms available are the same as those found under the 'Agreement Terms' tab and any related terms will be displayed both here and under the 'Agreement Items' tab .

section.title: How do I create a term for an agreement item?

listitem.para: The 'Edit Agreement Item Term' screen is displayed

section.title: How do I update a term for an agreement item?

listitem.para: Select the term for the agreement item by clicking on the term id
The 'Edit Agreement Item Term' screen is displayed

section.title: How do I delete a term for an agreement item?

listitem.para: Press the 'Remove' button on the term entry that needs to be deleted.
